text: Is there a way to set default setting in the drag and drop sections? For example, always setting content alignment to center content and setting maximum content width to 1200px?
can we set the page font via hubl with the new dnd syntax?
Hey Dan! You can set generic values for something like section max width using CSS, similar to how the boilerplate is set up:

<@UDV9GD8BB> Just repeating to make sure I understand exactly: the idea here is that you can’t predict what the background image will be in this case — it could be a light image or a dark one — and therefore you need to be able to quickly change the text within that section to suit, to use something like a) fonts for a dark background or b) fonts for a light background. Is that accurate?

And <@UPJ8FNPTK> that’s an interesting case! Would you mind sharing some more specifics about what you’re building? What kind of module choice affects what kinds of element styling? Just making sure I totally follow. Feel free to DM me on here if you’d prefer!
